    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Applicant
    Represents an HDB BTO applicant, extending the generic User class.
    ApplicantController
    Implements all applicant‐side use cases: Browsing projects Submitting and viewing applications Submitting, viewing, editing, deleting enquiries Requesting withdrawal
    ApplicantMenu
    Provides the console‐based menu for Applicants to interact with the system.
    ApplicantRepository
    In‐memory repository for storing and retrieving Applicant objects, keyed by NRIC.
    Application
    Represents a flat booking application submitted by an Applicant.
    ApplicationController
    Manages the application's in‐memory repository of Application entities.
    ApplicationRepository
    In‐memory repository for storing and retrieving Application objects, keyed by a unique application ID.
    ApplicationStatus
    Enumerates the possible statuses for a flat booking application.
    Enquiry
    Represents a project enquiry submitted by an applicant.
    EnquiryController
    Provides services for creating and managing enquiries within the system.
    EnquiryRepository
    In‐memory repository for storing and retrieving Enquiry objects, keyed by a unique enquiry ID.
    IApplicantServices
    Defines the services available to Applicants: browseProjects submitApplication viewApplicationStatus submitEnquiry viewEnquiries editEnquiry deleteEnquiry requestWithdrawal
    IApplicationServices
    Defines application‐management services for various roles: Adding and removing applications Retrieving successful applications for officers Retrieving an applicant’s own applications Retrieving booked, pending, and cancelling applications for managers
    IEnquiryServices
    Defines enquiry‐management services for applicants, officers, and managers: Submit a new enquiry Retrieve an applicant’s own enquiries Delete an existing enquiry Retrieve enquiries for specific projects Retrieve all enquiries for managers
    IManagerServices
    Defines management services available to Manager users: Create, edit, delete BTO projects View all projects or own projects Toggle project visibility View and process officer registrations Process applicant applications and withdrawals Generate reports View and reply to enquiries
    IOfficerServices
    Defines services available to Officers: Submit applications Process flat selection Register for projects View registration status View project details View and reply to enquiries Generate booking receipts
    IProjectServices
    Defines services for managing and retrieving Project entities: Retrieve projects eligible for a user Retrieve projects created by a manager or view all projects Lookup, add, and remove projects Filter a set of projects by neighborhood and flat type
    IRegistrationServices
    Defines registration services for both Officers and Managers: Retrieve an officer’s own registrations Add a new registration Retrieve registrations for a manager’s projects
    MainMenu
    Main entry‐point menu for the BTO Management System.
    Manager
    Represents a manager user in the BTO system.
    ManagerController
    Provides all management operations for the Manager role: Create, edit, delete BTO projects View all projects or only own projects Toggle project visibility Handle officer registrations Process applicant applications and withdrawals Generate summary reports View and reply to enquiries
    ManagerMenu
    Console‐based menu for Manager users to interact with the system.
    ManagerRepository
    In‐memory repository for storing and retrieving Manager objects, keyed by NRIC.
    Officer
    Represents an HDB officer, who is also an Applicant with additional responsibilities.
    OfficerController
    Implements all officer‐side operations: Submitting applications Processing flat selection Registering for projects Viewing registration status and project details Handling and replying to enquiries Generating booking receipts
    OfficerMenu
    Console‐based menu for Officer users to interact with the system.
    OfficerRepository
    In‐memory repository for storing and retrieving Officer objects, keyed by NRIC.
    Project
    Represents a Build‐To‐Order (BTO) project, including its name, neighborhood, unit types, application period, assigned manager, officer slots, and visibility status.
    ProjectController
    Manages all project‐related operations: Retrieve eligible projects for any user Fetch projects created by a manager or view all projects Lookup, add, and remove projects Filter projects by neighborhood and flat type
    ProjectRepository
    In‐memory repository for storing and retrieving Project objects, keyed by project name.
    Registration
    Represents a registration request by an Officer for a BTO project.
    RegistrationController
    Implements registration services for both officers and managers: Add new registrations Retrieve an officer’s own registrations Retrieve all registrations for projects managed by a manager
    RegistrationRepository
    In‐memory repository for storing and retrieving Registration objects, keyed by a unique registration ID.
    RegistrationStatus
    Enumerates the possible statuses for officer registration requests.
    UnitType
    Represents a flat unit type within a BTO project, tracking total units, available/unbooked units, and pricing.
    User
    Base class representing a system user with common attributes and filter settings.
    UserType
    Enumerates the types of users in the system and their roles: APPLICANT – submits flat applications and enquiries OFFICER – processes applications, handles enquiries, and registers for projects MANAGER – creates projects, approves applications, and manages registrations
